title: Endgame Score screen
body: The endgame score screen does not load for me.  I have tried repairing and reinstalling the client to no avail.  I have to close the client and log in after every match.  Any help?

replies.body: I do not have that option checked.

Galacius raises a good question here!  You might have [Close Client During Game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) toggled, which would close your client to improve pc stress while in a game.  As a result, it will take a few moments to load it back up once the match is over.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Hello Sir Fizz,

Do you by chance have a option in the client "close client during game" checked?
